general.permission_denied_error: You do not have permission to access this command!

etc.coin_error: I can't flip that many coins!
etc.remindme_error: Include a time and a note!
etc.filter_reply: {u}, your message contained content disabled on this server and has been removed.

vote.proposal_error: Please specify the number of options, list the options, and then name the vote!
vote.search_error: A vote by this name does not exist!
vote.corruption_error: The message representing this vote was deleted.
vote.search_error_blank: You have never created a vote!

logs.log_response: Thank you {u}, I have logged your animal product usage.
logs.undo_response: {u}, I removed your last log entry!
logs.undo_error: You have never used an animal product!
logs.when_response: It has been {d} since {u} has used animal products! {s}
logs.when_error: To my knowledge, {u} has never used an animal product. Commendable!
logs.chart_error: Please specify between 1 and 365 days as the day count.

quotes.author_error: Tag someone to get a quote by them!
quotes.name_error: This user does not have a quote attribution name!
quotes.add_error: Please @mention someone and then write their new quote attribution name.
quotes.num_author_error: Tag someone to get their quote count!

reminders.reminder: {u}, you asked me to remind you: {n}
reminders.late_reminder: {u}, I was offline but you asked me to remind you: {n}

clear.error: Please specify a number of messages to remove (between 0 and 100)
clear.response: I have cleared {n} messages for you.

cfg.teach_error: Please specify a part of speech and a word.
cfg.forget_error: Please specify a part of speech and a word.
cfg.vocab_error: Please supply a valid part of speech or "all".

help_items.`!chart <days> [@mention @mention ...]`: produce a visualization your logs for the last `days` days; optionally show logs by `@mention`(s) instead
help_items.*`!clear <count>`: clear `count` of most recent messages in this channel
help_items.*`!delquotes <query>`: delete all quotes matching `query`; be careful, may delete many at once!
help_items.`!flipcoin [coins]`: flip a coin either once or up to {etc.max_coins} times
help_items.`!forget <part_of_speech> <phrase>`: delete `phrase` from the `part_of_speech` list, if it exists there
help_items.`!name [@mention]`: show the quote attribution name of yourself or `@mention`
help_items.`!numquotes [query]`: count the number of either all quotes or those matching `query`
help_items.`!ping`: get a response from bot, mainly to ensure it is running
help_items.`!quote [query]`: display a random quote matching `query`, or display any random quote with bias towards ones relevant to recent messages
help_items.`!rng <max>`: randomly select a number between 1 and `max`
help_items.`!setname [@mention] <name>`: set your quote attribution name to `name`; optionally, set `@mention`'s name instead
help_items.`!signature <word>`: set your one-word (can be emoji) conclusion to `!when` calls about you
help_items.`!speak [count]`: produce a randomly generated sentence using learned vocabulary; optionally produce `count` sentences at once
help_items.`!teach <part_of_speech> <phrase>`: add `phrase` to the `part_of_speech` list, if not already there
help_items.`!undo`: permanently delete your most recent event log
help_items.`!vocab <part_of_speech|\"all\"> [\"coun: list all known phrases in `part_of_speech` list, or all known phrases if "all", splitting into multiple messages if needed; optionally shows just the count
help_items.`!vote <count> <opt1>...<optcount> <name: initiate a vote on `name` with `count` options listed in `opt1` through `optcount`; votes are counted by reacting to the bot's reply
help_items.`!votestatus [query]`: report the current results for the most recent vote; optionally use the most recent vote whose name matches `query` instead
help_items.`!when [@mention]`: show your most recent event log with your custom signature; optionally show `@mention`'s log instead
help_items.`!{alias.log} [caption]`: add an event log; optionally caption it with `caption`
help_items.**:pushpin: pinning**: if {quotes.pin_threshold} users react with :pushpin: to a message, that message is added as a quote attributed to the message's author

help.header: The following commands/features are available. ***** indicates the caller must be known as admin by the bot. `<args>` are requrired arguments while `[args]` are optional.
